name: Pick-it
description:
Pick up space debris, then trade it in for items to help you collect more debris.

Created in 2 days with support of Bossa Studios, who kindly allowed me to make this during working time :)

Controls:

WASD - move

Mouse - Look/steer

LMB/RMB - strafe up/down

Space - Dash

Alt - brake

Shift - Activate Bounce Bubble

E - Interact
